description: Form input component for text entry with v-model binding. Supports various input types (text, email, password, number, tel, url). Interactive and keyboard-accessible.
useCase: Use for forms, search bars, login fields, contact forms, filters, and any user text input. Bind to state with modelValue for reactive data.

type.description: Input type: text, email, password, number, tel, url, search, etc.

placeholder.description: Placeholder text shown when input is empty

class.description: CSS classes for styling and sizing

id.description: Unique identifier, also used for label association

automation.semanticRole: Text input field with keyboard entry
automation.recognitionPattern: Detected by <input> tag, automatically recognized by automation_agent.js
automation.note: Supports automation actions: type(text), clear(), focus(). The 'input' event updates modelValue binding.
